item.title: West Virginia National Guard member dies after being shot in DC attack, Trump says

item.title: Hong Kong fire death toll rises to 128 people, officials say
item.description: The death toll from the massive fire at a residential apartment complex in Hong Kong rose to 128 as of Friday, as search and rescue efforts continued.

item.title: Family celebrates 2nd Thanksgiving dinner with mail carrier who came to father's aid
item.description: Jayden Lockhart proposed to his girlfriend on Thursday in front of the family he helped.
